scripts.predeploy: git add dist -f && git commit -m "Deployment commit"
scripts.deploy: git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
scripts.install-dependencies: npm install -D webpack webpack-cli style-loader css-loader file-loader webpack-dev-server copy-webpack-plugin webpack-merge terser-webpack-plugin image-minimizer-webpack-plugin imagemin imagemin-pngquant
scripts.uninstall-dependencies: npm uninstall -D webpack webpack-cli style-loader css-loader file-loader webpack-dev-server copy-webpack-plugin webpack-merge terser-webpack-plugin image-minimizer-webpack-plugin imagemin imagemin-pngquant
